# File lib/ramaze/tool/bin.rb, line 165
        def include_ramaze # {{{
          begin
            $:.unshift File.join(File.dirname(__FILE__), '/../lib')
            require 'ramaze'
          rescue LoadError
            $:.shift

            begin
              require 'rubygems'
            rescue LoadError
            end
            require 'ramaze'
          end
        end
